teamcomments-desc: Eiks <comments> parser huik that permits commentin oan pages
teamcomments-db-locked:
Eikin comments

The database is nou locked fer routine database maintenance, efter this it will be back til normal. Please check back later!
teamcomments-block-warning-anon: Ar ye sair that ye want tae permanentlie ignore aw comments fae this anonymous uiser (bi waa o thair IP address)?
teamcomments-block-warning-user: Ar ye sair that ye want tae permanentlie ignore aw comments fae uiser $1?
teamcomments-delete-warning: Ar ye sair that ye want tae delyte this comment?
teamcomments-ignore-message: Ye'r ignorin the auther o this comment
teamcomments-login-required: Ye maun be loggit in tae eik comments
teamcomments-not-allowed: Ye'r na permitit tae post comments.
teamcomments-anon-message: {{SITENAME}} weelcomes aw comments. Gif ye dinna want tae be anonymous, register or log in. It's free.
teamcomments-links-are-forbidden: External links in comments ar forbidden!
teamcomments-is-spam: Submitted tex o the comment wis interpreted aes spam.
teamcomments-ignore-no-users: Thaur ar naw uisers blockit richt nou.
teamcomments-ignore-remove-message: Ar ye sair ye want tae onblock uiser $1's comments?
log-description-teamcomments: This is ae log o comments.
